// VIBE CODE CHALLENGE v4 - Clean apps, chat-style BYTE, working demos import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef, useCallback } from 'react'; import { Button } from './components'; import { updateGamePhase, submitToGame, submitVote } from './firebase'; // BYTE personality responses const BYTE_PERSONALITY = { greetings: [ "Hey hey! BYTE here, your friendly neighborhood code wizard! What are we building today?", "Yo! Ready to create something awesome? Tell me your wildest app idea!", "BYTE online and HYPED! Let's turn your imagination into a real app!" ], ideaReceived: [ "Ooooh I LOVE that! My circuits are already buzzing with possibilities!", "YES! Now THAT'S what I call a great idea! Let me marinate on this...", "Now we're talking! This is gonna be fun!" ], askingDetails: [ "Okay okay, I'm getting excited! But tell me more - what vibe are you going for? Dark mode? Bright and colorful? Minimalist? Give me the deets!", "Love it! Now paint me a picture - what should it LOOK like? What colors? What feeling should users get?", "Awesome concept! Help me visualize it - describe the look and feel you're imagining!" ], startCoding: [ "*cracks digital knuckles* Alright, stand back - BYTE is about to do what BYTE does best!", "Code mode: ACTIVATED! Watch the magic happen...", "Initiating build sequence! This is my favorite part..." ], codingProgress: [ "Laying down the foundation... looking good so far!", "Adding some style... gotta make it pretty!", "Wiring up the interactivity... almost there!" ], appComplete: [ "BOOM! Check it out - your app is ALIVE! Click around, try the buttons!", "And just like that... we have an APP! Take it for a spin!", "Ta-da! Your creation awaits! Go ahead, play with it!" ], iterationAsk: [ "So whatcha think? Want me to change anything? Different colors? More features? I'm all ears!", "How's it looking? Tell me what to tweak and I'll make it happen!", "Your wish is my command! What should I adjust?" ], iterationStart: [ "On it! Give me just a sec...", "Good call! Let me tweak that real quick...", "I see what you mean! Making that change now..." ], iterationComplete: [ "Done! How's that looking now?", "Boom - updated! Better?", "There we go! What do you think?" ], encouragement: [ "You've got great instincts for this!", "We make a pretty good team, huh?", "Look at you, basically a tech founder already!" ], submitSuccess: [ "Your app has been submitted to the showcase! You should be proud - this turned out great!", "Submitted! Can't wait for everyone to see what we built together!", "Done! Your app is ready for its big debut!" ] }; const getResponse = (category) => { const responses = BYTE_PERSONALITY[category] || ["..."]; return responses[Math.floor(Math.random() * responses.length)]; }; // BYTE Avatar const ByteAvatar = ({ mood = 'happy', size = 'md', speaking = false, typing = false }) => { const sizes = { sm: 'w-10 h-10 text-lg', md: 'w-12 h-12 text-xl', lg: 'w-16 h-16 text-2xl' }; const colors = { happy: 'from-emerald-500 to-teal-600', excited: 'from-amber-500 to-orange-500', coding: 'from-violet-500 to-purple-600', thinking: 'from-blue-500 to-indigo-600', proud: 'from-pink-500 to-rose-500' }; return (
{mood === 'coding' ? '' : mood === 'thinking' ? '?' : ':)'} {(speaking || typing) && ( )}
); }; // Chat Message const ChatMessage = ({ from, text, mood, isTyping }) => { const isByte = from === 'byte'; return (
{isByte ? ( ) : (
YOU
)}
{isTyping ? (
) : (

{text}

)}
); }; // Code Panel with streaming and auto-switch to preview const CodePanel = ({ code, streamedCode, isStreaming, showPreview, title, onFullscreen }) => { const codeRef = useRef(null); const displayCode = isStreaming ? streamedCode : code; useEffect(() => { if (codeRef.current && isStreaming) { codeRef.current.scrollTop = codeRef.current.scrollHeight; } }, [streamedCode, isStreaming]); return (
{/* Header */}
{title || 'My App'} {isStreaming && ( BYTE is coding... )}
{!isStreaming && code && (
{showPreview ? 'Preview' : 'Code'}
)}
{/* Content */}
{(isStreaming || !showPreview) ? ( 
            {displayCode ? (
              
                {displayCode.split('\n').map((line, i) => (
                  

                    {i + 1}
                    ]+>/.test(line) ? 'text-blue-400' :
                      line.includes('"') || line.includes("'") ? 'text-amber-400' :
                      'text-slate-300'
                    }>{line || ' '}
                  

                ))}
                {isStreaming && |}
              
            ) : (
              

                

                  
{''}

            )}
) : (
